page.title: 14CHILDREN'S WEEKENDS 3.
page.content: {Sunday.}I get up and play a game until mum wakes up.After breakfast we get ready for church.I play another game when I we get home until dinner is ready.After dinner I do my homework or any odd jobs until tea.When we have eaten we get ready for church again.Back at home we pack our schoolbags and go to bed. 2.When I wake up I read until mum and dad wake up.After breakfast I go and feed my guinea pigs & tadpoles & give my tortoise some lettuce and then I go to the park to play.After dinner we sometimes go swimming,or I play with my 2 dogs or my hula hoop.When tea has been eaten I have my hair washed and have a bath.When my hair is dry I go to bed. 3.Every Sunday we go swimming.We take our dinner if it's warm.For tea we buy fish & chips from the shop.
